full_summary:
# Radiation Meters and Antenna Probes Tender Announcement

## Tender Reference

* **Tender Reference:** PW-23-01024649
* **Solicitation Number:** W8486-217955/A

## Tender Description

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals from suppliers to provide radiation meters and antenna probes. The required items are:

* Narda SRM-3006 Selective Radiation Meter
* Narda 6 GHz Three-axis, E-field Antenna Probes
* Narda 3 GHz Three-axis, E-field Antenna Probe
* Narda 9 kHz to 300 MHz E-field Antenna Probe

## Scope of Work

The successful supplier will be required to deliver the specified items to 45 Sacré-Coeur Blvd, Gatineau, QC by June 30, 2023. The quantity of items required is as follows:

* 2 units of Narda SRM-3006 Selective Radiation Meter
* 2 units of Narda 6 GHz Three-axis, E-field Antenna Probes
* 2 units of Narda 3 GHz Three-axis, E-field Antenna Probe
* 2 units of Narda 9 kHz to 300 MHz E-field Antenna Probe

## Evaluation Criteria

Bidders are required to indicate the brand name and model, and/or part number and the NCAGE of the products they are offering. A preference will be given to Canadian goods and/or services.

## Tender Requirements

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* Justin Laundrie
* Phone: 343-571-8929
* Email: [Justin.Laundrie@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Justin.Laundrie@forces.gc.ca)

## Notice URL

The tender notice and supporting documents are available on the Canada Buys website at:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/03/079e7e181318311dc4518a716b3f63d8/w8486-217955a_rfp_english.pdf (English)
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/03/bcc8eecb3c6cc0d67fdcfd70cfe1aad2/w8486-217955a_rfp_french.pdf
